channel.title: Wrong decals in Lambda Core after loading save file
channel.description:
Today I had a strange bug that happened on bm_c3a2f/Lambda Core. In the room where you pull the switch and that tube thing overloads and shoots red energy beams, the decals get mixed up after loading a save. 1. enable the overload sequence 2. let it shoot a couple of beams 3. save (3.1 die) 4. load save-file 5. strange decals appear
What I mean by that is that the scorch marks are replaced with sign plates "Caution High Radiation Area". Looks kinda funny though:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/l8T0ilb.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/uJgSVdh.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/QhN6HxB.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/LhYSaBS.jpg[/img]

item.title: Wrong decals in Lambda Core after loading save file
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
Today I had a strange bug that happened on bm_c3a2f/Lambda Core.
In the room where you pull the switch and that tube thing overloads and shoots red energy beams, the decals get mixed up after loading a save.

  1. enable the overload sequence
  2. let it shoot a couple of beams
  3. save
    (3.1 die)
  4. load save-file
  5. strange decals appear

What I mean by that is that the scorch marks are replaced with sign plates “Caution High Radiation Area”.
Looks kinda funny though:
